Articles.Content:
The pilot view in the lower right corner shows the current mood of the Kerbals.

Sometimes if they feel safe and comfortable (I guess?) they'll "dance" by waving their arms, and sometimes they'll adjust their helmets.

It makes me feel like they really know what they're doing.

I think it's just natural for them to do that when they're EVAing, say, on the surface of the Mun feeling safe.

Wouldn't it be nice?
i am pretty much sure more animations and general polishes(like an animation for entering/exiting vehicles) and such will follow once the games base components are done
